data.eml:eml: A new species, Simulium (Nevermannia) berchtesgadense (Diptera: Simuliidae), and its chromosomes, from the Alps of southeastern Germany

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seitz, Gunther, Adler, Peter H., Forster, Mira (2015): A new species, Simulium (Nevermannia) berchtesgadense (Diptera: Simuliidae), and its chromosomes, from the Alps of southeastern Germany. Zootaxa 3937 (2): 248-262, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3937.2.2
